text: Anna Campori (22 September 1917 â€“ 19 January 2018)Addio ad Anna Campori del Corsaro Nero was an Italian actress. Beginning her career in 1951, she appeared in 70 movies. She was born in Rome, Italy. She made her last appearance in the TV series Carabinieri. She turned 100 in September 2017 and died on 19 January 2018 in Rome. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1917 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian centenarians Category:Actors from Rome
title: Anna Campori
